name: Far Fetched (Fat Alien Cat)
description:
After being blown in from a storm,  Spot comes across a mysterious archipelago of floating islands. 

Help the local inhabitants, upgrade your plane and complete the islands challenges. 

Explore a hand crafted map to collect plane components and customise your plane.  Compete in mini games and explore new heights.

This game is still early in development and we are looking for your feedback to help guide and improve the game. 

What mini games, collectables and secrets would you like added? 

What other quirky characters would you like to meet?

Please leave your thoughts in the comments below.

If you want to help support the development of this game please consider donating when you download. 

----

Made by:  Fat Alien Cat

Mechanic Scene - Music by Caffeine_Creek_Band from Pixabay

Note: This game hasn't been optimised completely yet so it may not run as smoothly and have a lower frame rates on lower end computers. 

For the best experience we recommend playing with a controller but you can also use a mouse and keyboard.
